text.message: Sesiunea de alegere a opționalelor este:

codes.NO_PASSWORD_OR_EMAIL_PROVIDED: Please provide both a password and an email
codes.INVALID_CREDENTIALS: The password or the email were wrong
codes.ACCOUNT_NOT_VERIFIED: Your account wasn`t verified yet. You will receive an email as soon as your account is verified.
codes.PASSWORD_NOT_CHANGED: Please reset your password before logging in for the first time

codes.NO_PASSWORD_OR_EMAIL_PROVIDED: Please provide both a password and an email
codes.SUCCESS: Your account was created succesfully. Once your account is verified, you will be notified by email
